description: Monitor Server Using Live PerfMon Metrics

targets.rawSql:
SET TRANSACTION ISOLATION LEVEL READ UNCOMMITTED;
SET QUOTED_IDENTIFIER OFF
DECLARE @sql varchar(max) = "
declare @start_time datetime = DATEADD(mi, DATEDIFF(mi, GETUTCDATE(), GETDATE()), $__timeFrom())
		,@end_time datetime = DATEADD(mi, DATEDIFF(mi, GETUTCDATE(), GETDATE()), $__timeTo());
	
declare @program_name nvarchar(500);
declare @login_name nvarchar(255);
declare @database nvarchar(500);
declare @session_id int;
declare @session_host_name nvarchar(125);
declare @query_pattern nvarchar(500);

if len(ltrim(rtrim('$program_name'))) > 0
  set @program_name = '$program_name'
if len(ltrim(rtrim('$login_name'))) > 0
  set @login_name = '$login_name'
if len(ltrim(rtrim('$database'))) > 0
  set @database = '$database'
if len(ltrim(rtrim('$session_host_name'))) > 0
  set @session_host_name = '$session_host_name'
if len(ltrim(rtrim('$query_pattern'))) > 0
  set @query_pattern = '$query_pattern'
if len(ltrim(rtrim('$session_id'))) > 0 and (case when '$session_id' like '%[^0-9.]%' then 'invalid' when '$session_id' like '%.%.%' then 'invalid' else 'valid' end) = 'valid'
  set @session_id = convert(int,'$session_id');
  
/*
if( @program_name is null 
    and @login_name is null 
    and @database is null 
    and @session_id is null 
    and @session_host_name is null 
    and @query_pattern is null 
    and datediff(minute,@start_time, @end_time) > 15)
  select 'Kindly provide one of the filters, and/or reduce the time range to 15 minutes.'
*/
;with cte_sessions as (
  select [collection_time] = DATEADD(mi, DATEDIFF(mi, getdate(), getutcdate()), w.collection_time), w.session_id, 
  		w.[dd hh:mm:ss.mss], w.program_name, w.login_name, w.database_name, w.host_name,
  		w.status, w.CPU, w.used_memory, w.open_tran_count, 
  		w.wait_info, 
  		sql_command = case when w.sql_command is not null then left(replace(replace(convert(nvarchar(max),w.sql_command),char(13)+char(10),''),'<?query --',''),150)
  							else left(replace(replace(convert(nvarchar(max),w.sql_text),char(13)+char(10),''),'<?query --',''),150) end, 
  		w.blocked_session_count, 
  		w.blocking_session_id, w.reads, w.writes, w.tempdb_allocations, 
  		w.tasks, w.percent_complete, start_time = convert(varchar,w.start_time,120)
  from $whoisactive_table_name w with (nolock)
  where w.collection_time = (select top 1 i.collection_time from $whoisactive_table_name i with (nolock)order by i.collection_time desc)
)
select *
from cte_sessions w
where 1 = 1
and (@program_name is null or w.program_name like ('%'+@program_name+'%'))
and (@database is null or w.database_name like ('%'+@database+'%'))
and (@login_name is null or w.login_name like ('%'+@login_name+'%'))
and (@session_host_name is null or w.host_name like ('%'+@session_host_name+'%'))
and (@query_pattern is null or w.sql_command like ('%'+@query_pattern+'%'))
and (@session_id is null or w.session_id = @session_id)
order by w.collection_time DESC, w.start_time ASC
"
SET QUOTED_IDENTIFIER ON
IF ('$server' = SERVERPROPERTY('ServerName'))
BEGIN
  EXEC (@sql);
END;
ELSE
BEGIN
  EXEC (@sql) AT [$server];
END;

panels.title: WhoIsActive Data - Latest Captured - FILTERED - @ ${whoisactive_collection_time_utc:date:YYYY-MM-DD HH.mm}
What's Running - [sp_WhoIsActive] - DBA Maintenance - Workload  @ ${whoisactive_collection_time_utc:date:YYYY-MM-DD HH.mm}
What's Running - [sp_WhoIsActive] - SQL Server Agent Jobs @ ${whoisactive_collection_time_utc:date:YYYY-MM-DD HH.mm}

targets.rawSql:
SET TRANSACTION ISOLATION LEVEL READ UNCOMMITTED;
SET QUOTED_IDENTIFIER OFF
DECLARE @sql varchar(max) = "
declare @start_time datetime = DATEADD(mi, DATEDIFF(mi, GETUTCDATE(), GETDATE()), $__timeFrom())
		,@end_time datetime = DATEADD(mi, DATEDIFF(mi, GETUTCDATE(), GETDATE()), $__timeTo());

if exists ( select * from $whoisactive_table_name w with (nolock)
            where w.collection_time = (select max(i.collection_time) from $whoisactive_table_name i with (nolock)) 
            and datediff(minute,start_time,collection_time) >= $duration )
begin
  select [collection_time] = convert(varchar,w.collection_time,120), w.session_id, 
  		w.[dd hh:mm:ss.mss], w.program_name, w.login_name, w.database_name, w.host_name,
  		w.status, w.CPU, w.used_memory, w.open_tran_count, 
  		w.wait_info, 
  		sql_command = case when w.sql_command is not null then left(replace(replace(convert(nvarchar(max),w.sql_command),char(13)+char(10),''),'<?query --',''),150)
  							else left(replace(replace(convert(nvarchar(max),w.sql_text),char(13)+char(10),''),'<?query --',''),150) end, 
  		w.blocked_session_count, 
  		w.blocking_session_id, w.reads, w.writes, w.tempdb_allocations, 
  		w.tasks, w.percent_complete, start_time = convert(varchar,w.start_time,120)
  from $whoisactive_table_name w with (nolock)
  where w.collection_time = (select max(i.collection_time) from dbo.WhoIsActive i with (nolock))
  and datediff(minute,start_time,collection_time) >= $duration
  order by w.collection_time DESC, w.start_time ASC
end
ELSE
  select 'No long running query found for time window' as [No Result]
"
SET QUOTED_IDENTIFIER ON
IF ('$server' = SERVERPROPERTY('ServerName'))
BEGIN
  EXEC (@sql);
END;
ELSE
BEGIN
  EXEC (@sql) AT [$server];
END;

SET TRANSACTION ISOLATION LEVEL READ UNCOMMITTED;
SET QUOTED_IDENTIFIER OFF
DECLARE @sql varchar(max) = "
declare @start_time datetime = DATEADD(mi, DATEDIFF(mi, GETUTCDATE(), GETDATE()), $__timeFrom())
		,@end_time datetime = DATEADD(mi, DATEDIFF(mi, GETUTCDATE(), GETDATE()), $__timeTo());
	
declare @program_name nvarchar(500);
declare @login_name nvarchar(255);
declare @database nvarchar(500);
declare @session_id int;
declare @session_host_name nvarchar(125);
declare @query_pattern nvarchar(500);

if len(ltrim(rtrim('$program_name'))) > 0
  set @program_name = '$program_name'
if len(ltrim(rtrim('$login_name'))) > 0
  set @login_name = '$login_name'
if len(ltrim(rtrim('$database'))) > 0
  set @database = '$database'
if len(ltrim(rtrim('$session_host_name'))) > 0
  set @session_host_name = '$session_host_name'
if len(ltrim(rtrim('$query_pattern'))) > 0
  set @query_pattern = '$query_pattern'
if len(ltrim(rtrim('$session_id'))) > 0 and (case when '$session_id' like '%[^0-9.]%' then 'invalid' when '$session_id' like '%.%.%' then 'invalid' else 'valid' end) = 'valid'
  set @session_id = convert(int,'$session_id');

;with cte_sessions as (
  select [collection_time] = DATEADD(mi, DATEDIFF(mi, getdate(), getutcdate()), w.collection_time), w.session_id, 
  		w.[dd hh:mm:ss.mss], w.program_name, w.login_name, w.database_name, w.host_name,
  		w.status, w.CPU, w.used_memory, w.open_tran_count, 
  		w.wait_info, 
  		sql_command = case when w.sql_command is not null then left(replace(replace(convert(nvarchar(max),w.sql_command),char(13)+char(10),''),'<?query --',''),150)
  							else left(replace(replace(convert(nvarchar(max),w.sql_text),char(13)+char(10),''),'<?query --',''),150) end, 
  		w.blocked_session_count, 
  		w.blocking_session_id, w.reads, w.writes, w.tempdb_allocations, 
  		w.tasks, w.percent_complete, start_time = convert(varchar,w.start_time,120)
  from $whoisactive_table_name w with (nolock)
  where w.collection_time between @start_time and @end_time
)
select *
from cte_sessions w
where 1 = 1
and (@program_name is null or w.program_name like ('%'+@program_name+'%'))
and (@database is null or w.database_name like ('%'+@database+'%'))
and (@login_name is null or w.login_name like ('%'+@login_name+'%'))
and (@session_host_name is null or w.host_name like ('%'+@session_host_name+'%'))
and (@query_pattern is null or w.sql_command like ('%'+@query_pattern+'%'))
and (@session_id is null or w.session_id = @session_id)
order by w.collection_time DESC, w.start_time ASC
"
SET QUOTED_IDENTIFIER ON
IF ('$server' = SERVERPROPERTY('ServerName'))
BEGIN
  EXEC (@sql);
END;
ELSE
BEGIN
  EXEC (@sql) AT [$server];
END;

list.definition:
SET TRANSACTION ISOLATION LEVEL READ UNCOMMITTED;
SET QUOTED_IDENTIFIER OFF
DECLARE @sql varchar(max) = "
select top 1 collection_time_utc
from [$inventory_db].dbo.vw_performance_counters
where host_name = '$host_name'
order by collection_time_utc desc
"
SET QUOTED_IDENTIFIER ON
IF ('$server' = SERVERPROPERTY('ServerName'))
BEGIN
  EXEC (@sql);
END;
ELSE
BEGIN
  EXEC (@sql) AT [$server];
END;
list.label: Collection Time UTC
list.name: collection_time_utc

list.definition:
declare @start_time datetime = $__timeFrom()
declare @end_time datetime = $__timeTo();

declare @_duration_minute int = datediff(minute,@start_time,@end_time);
select [@delta_minutes] = (case when @_duration_minute <= 30 then 1 
                                                           when @_duration_minute <= 60 then 2
                                                           when @_duration_minute <= 120 then 5
                                                           when @_duration_minute <= 480 then 10
                                                           when @_duration_minute <= 1440 then 15
                                                           when @_duration_minute <= 2880 then 20
                                                           when @_duration_minute <= 10080 then 30
                                                           else 60 end);
list.name: cpu_delta_minutes
list.query:
declare @start_time datetime = $__timeFrom()
declare @end_time datetime = $__timeTo();

declare @_duration_minute int = datediff(minute,@start_time,@end_time);
select [@delta_minutes] = (case when @_duration_minute <= 30 then 1 
                                                           when @_duration_minute <= 60 then 2
                                                           when @_duration_minute <= 120 then 5
                                                           when @_duration_minute <= 480 then 10
                                                           when @_duration_minute <= 1440 then 15
                                                           when @_duration_minute <= 2880 then 20
                                                           when @_duration_minute <= 10080 then 30
                                                           else 60 end);
